mapper.insert: insert into customer_spring_mvc (name, age, adress) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{adress})
mapper.select: select name, age, adress, insert_date from customer_spring_mvc where id = #{id}
select id, name, age, adress, insert_date from customer_spring_mvc order by insert_date desc

select id, name, age, adress, insert_date from customer_spring_mvc where 1 = 1
and (name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by insert_date desc

select id, name, age, adress, insert_date from customer_spring_mvc where 1 = 1
and (insert_date like CONCAT('%',#{keyword2},'%'))
order by insert_date desc

select id, name, age, adress, insert_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,insert_date,NOW()) AS time from customer_spring_mvc where 1 = 1
and 2=2
and (insert_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 hour))
and (insert_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 1 day))
and (insert_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 3 day))
and (insert_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 7 day))
and (insert_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 30 day))
order by insert_date desc
select count(id) as tot from customer_spring_mvc
select id, name, age, adress, insert_date, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,insert_date,NOW()) AS time from customer_spring_mvc order by insert_date limit #{displayPost},#{postNum}
